bibl.title: Greek and Roman Libraries in the Hellenistic Age.
bibl.note: The library of Alexandria. - The Seleucid and Attalid Libraries at Antioch on the Orontes and Pergamum. - The first library collections in Rome. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: The Dead Sea Scrolls at Qumran and the Concept of a Library

bibl.seg: Monica Berti, Greek and Roman Libraries in the Hellenistic Age.
